cards.tarot_imply_en: new beginnings, innocence, and a leap of faith
cards.standalone_past_en: You once dared to set out without knowing the outcome, like a cat leaping from a window trusting it will land on its feet.
cards.standalone_present_en: Now is the time to trust your instincts and take a chance on the new path calling you.
cards.standalone_future_en: The future opens to fresh adventures if you stay open-hearted and release old limits.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Your past courage fuels today‚Äôs momentum and will carry you toward exciting new destinations.
cards.love_past_en: You fell headfirst into love before, learning directly from the experience.
cards.love_present_en: Your heart is wide open to new chances‚Äîdon‚Äôt fear starting a new chapter.
cards.love_future_en: A bright, playful connection awaits as long as you stay honest with your feelings.
cards.career_past_en: You started a project or career move with excitement even without a perfect map.
cards.career_present_en: This is the moment to experiment at work; you don‚Äôt need every answer‚Äîjust the courage to act.
cards.career_future_en: Your career path will bring unexpected opportunities if you‚Äôre willing to learn on the go.
cards.finance_past_en: You may have spent impulsively before, but the lesson made you more aware.
cards.finance_present_en: A small, calculated risk can broaden your view‚Äîjust mind the budget.
cards.finance_future_en: Fresh financial chances will appear if you‚Äôre unafraid to try a different approach.
cards.action_prompt_en: Take one step outside your usual box and see what the world has to teach.
cards.reflection_question_en: If fear weren‚Äôt a barrier, what would you try right now?
cards.affirmation_en: I welcome new beginnings with a joyful heart.
cards.hook_en: Is your backpack ready? A new adventure is waiting!
cards.ritual_2min_en: Stand with arms wide, breathe deeply, and tell yourself: ‚ÄòI trust my first step.‚Äô
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What do I want to begin?
Why is it calling me?
What first step can I take today?
cards.keywords_light: freedom, innocence, potential, leaps of faith, beginnings
cards.image_alt_en: A curious cat with a small pack stepping toward the edge of a sunny rooftop, butterflies fluttering nearby.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A playful tuxedo cat with a tiny satchel stepping toward the edge of a rooftop under a bright sky, butterflies fluttering, feeling of carefree adventure, art nouveau style, vibrant colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: The Fool tarot meaning: fresh starts, leaps of faith, and playful curiosity leading to new opportunities.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Secrets revealed, Confession, Failed plan, Returning, Coming clean
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have tried to cover up a mistake but couldn't outrun the truth, or decided to return and face a problem you fled. Past secrets might have just come to light.
cards.standalone_present_en: Busted! Hidden things are surfacing. You might feel pressured to confess or realize your plan isn't working. It's time to change tactics and stop the trickery.
cards.standalone_future_en: The truth will come out, and you must take responsibility. Confessing now will mitigate the damage. Running further will only make things worse.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past concealment is ending. The truth revealing itself now is an opportunity to fix things and start fresh with transparency in the future.
cards.love_past_en: Caught cheating, or returned to beg forgiveness from an ex after ghosting.
cards.love_present_en: Relationship secrets are out. Apologies and understanding are happening, or stopping the habit of secret chatting.
cards.love_future_en: Honesty can save it, but lies will lead to a bad end. Trust must be rebuilt.
cards.career_past_en: Secret plans leaked, or caught hiding a work mistake.
cards.career_present_en: Must fix sloppy work, or confess to the boss you can't finish on time. Don't keep making excuses.
cards.career_future_en: Honesty will save the day. Expect stricter internal audits.
cards.finance_past_en: Hidden debts were exposed, or stopped spending money secretly.
cards.finance_present_en: Returning stolen (or long-borrowed) items. Turning over a new financial leaf, or getting money back from a scammer.
cards.finance_future_en: You must pay damages, or start saving transparently and accountably.
cards.action_prompt_en: Confess now! Truth never dies. Admitting fault is the start of forgiveness.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you tired of wearing a mask and lying to yourself?
cards.affirmation_en: I choose to live my life based on truth and integrity.
cards.hook_en: No secrets are safe forever... the more you hide it, the more it stinks.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Write a confession on paper, then burn or tear it up to release the guilt you've been carrying.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What lie do you most want to confess?
How do you feel when a secret is out?
How will you rebuild trust with others?
cards.keywords_light: Confession, conscience, turning a new leaf, rethinking strategy, honesty
cards.keywords_shadow: Getting caught, pathology lying, cowardice, exposed secrets, shame
cards.image_alt_en: A cat dropping the stolen swords and looking guilty as other cats approach, the sun rising to reveal the theft.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A guilty ginger cat dropping five swords on the ground as a group of angry cats approaches from the background, sunrise illuminating the scene, expression of shame and being caught, art nouveau style, dramatic lighting --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Seven of Swords Reversed tarot meaning: Secrets revealed, getting caught, and confession. Learn how to come clean and rebuild trust.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Mental liberation, Finding a way out, Release from fear, Clarity, Awakening
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have felt trapped in a hopeless situation, but you found a way to untangle the knots and walk away. The suffocation of the past is slowly fading.
cards.standalone_present_en: The blindfold has fallen! You start to see the gaps between the swords surrounding you and realize those bonds were just your own thoughts. The exit is right there; just step forward.
cards.standalone_future_en: True freedom awaits. You will have the courage to face reality and deal with the problems you once feared. Your mind will become clear and sharp.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past fears that bound you are loosening, clearing the way for you to see the exit now and step into a future full of freedom and confidence.
cards.love_past_en: You decided to walk away from a suffocating relationship or stopped being afraid to open your heart to someone.
cards.love_present_en: Starting to talk rationally and reveal true feelings. Misunderstandings are being resolved.
cards.love_future_en: You will break free from a toxic relationship or find a solution to a long-standing problem.
cards.career_past_en: You dared to quit a job that stifled your talent or proposed an unconventional idea.
cards.career_present_en: Seeing new opportunities at work. Stopped negative thinking and started executing the plan.
cards.career_future_en: Work obstacles will be removed. You will work more smoothly and happily.
cards.finance_past_en: Successfully cleared a large debt or escaped a heavy financial burden.
cards.finance_present_en: Starting to see the light in solving financial problems. More mindful spending and planning.
cards.finance_future_en: Financial freedom will become reality if you maintain this discipline and intention.
cards.action_prompt_en: Step out! Don't hesitate. Believe in yourself that you can do it. The wide world awaits.
cards.reflection_question_en: What false belief have you recently unlocked from your mind?
cards.affirmation_en: I have the power to shape my own destiny freely.
cards.hook_en: The cage door isn't locked... come out and play, kitty!
cards.ritual_2min_en: Stand with arms wide open. Inhale deeply and shout 'Freedom!' (loudly or internally) to declare your intention of liberation.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is the first thing you will do when fully free?
Which fear have you overcome and feel proud of?
What new path do you see after the fog lifts?
cards.keywords_shadow: Confusion returning, hesitation, fear of freedom, self-doubt, regression
cards.image_alt_en: A cat stepping out of a circle of swords, bandage falling from its eyes, looking towards a bright horizon with a confident stride.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A confident white cat stepping out of a circle of eight swords stuck in the ground, red blindfold falling to the ground, looking towards a bright sunrise over green hills, sense of liberation, art nouveau style, vibrant colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Eight of Swords Reversed tarot meaning: Mental liberation, finding a way out, and release from fear. Discover your freedom and clarity.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Waking up, Releasing fear, Hope returning, Relief, End of nightmare
cards.standalone_past_en: You have just survived a long, torturous night of the soul. But you have opened your eyes to find that the worst is finally over.
cards.standalone_present_en: Deep breath... The light is pouring in! Anxiety is unraveling. You are starting to see a way out and are ready to ask for help or forgive yourself. The pressure is lifting.
cards.standalone_future_en: Your mental health will significantly improve. Inner peace will return. You will learn to manage stress and move forward with renewed confidence.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: The anguish of the past is fading. The present offers healing and awakening, leading to a bright future free from the shadows of fear.
cards.love_past_en: You dwelled in post-breakup sadness, or paranoia in the relationship has started to subside.
cards.love_present_en: Starting to discuss lingering issues openly. Misunderstandings are cleared, or you're healing and ready to move on from a bad love.
cards.love_future_en: Trust and brightness will return to the relationship, or you will find genuine happiness in solitude.
cards.career_past_en: Work stress is easing, or a major worry has been resolved.
cards.career_present_en: Seeing solutions to stuck projects. Receiving support from colleagues, or daring to ask for help when overwhelmed.
cards.career_future_en: Workplace pressure will decrease. You will work more happily and with greater ease.
cards.finance_past_en: Seeing light at the end of the debt tunnel, or financial worries are unraveling.
cards.finance_present_en: Found a solution for money management. Stopped stress-starving/insomnia and started fixing issues rationally.
cards.finance_future_en: Financial status will gradually improve. Stability returns after the crisis.
cards.action_prompt_en: Stop blaming yourself! Forgive your mistakes, then open the window to let sunlight and fresh air into your life.
cards.reflection_question_en: Which worry are you ready to release into the river today?
cards.affirmation_en: I am strong enough to walk through darkness into the light.
cards.hook_en: The nightmare is over... wake up and let's have some tasty treats.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Wake up and immediately smile at yourself in the mirror. Say thank you for 3 good things to clear lingering negative dream energy.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What worried you to death but turned out okay?
What is your best self-soothing method on bad days?
What is the small light you see today?
cards.keywords_light: Healing, relief, unburdening, reality check, optimism returning
cards.keywords_shadow: Lingering guilt, shame, persistent nightmare, refusal to seek help, despair
cards.image_alt_en: A cat sitting by a window with morning light streaming in, looking peaceful as nine swords fade away into shadows behind it.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A peaceful cat sitting on a windowsill bathed in warm morning sunlight, nine shadowy swords fading away into the dark corners of the room, atmosphere of relief and hope, Tarot Art Nouveau style, soft pastel colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Nine of Swords Reversed tarot meaning: Waking up, relief, and letting go of anxiety. Find hope and healing after the darkness.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Recovery, Survival, After the storm, Moving on, Rising up
cards.standalone_past_en: You recently survived the absolute worst moment of your life, like walking away from a major crash. The scars remain, but the acute pain is finally subsiding.
cards.standalone_present_en: The storm has passed! You are slowly picking yourself up and dusting off. Though still weak and shaken, the faint light on the horizon confirms you have survived.
cards.standalone_future_en: A new life is beginning. You will emerge stronger thanks to the lessons learned. The painful past will become just a memory that can no longer hurt you.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past suffering has ended. The present is for healing and recovery, paving the way for a bright future filled with new hope.
cards.love_past_en: Escaped an abusive or severely damaging relationship, or started healing after a devastating breakup.
cards.love_present_en: Starting to open up to love again, or a rock-bottom relationship is finally showing signs of improvement.
cards.love_future_en: You will permanently break free from painful love cycles and find a relationship that is truly healing.
cards.career_past_en: Lost a job or faced bankruptcy, but managed to survive and stay afloat.
cards.career_present_en: The career crisis is over. Seeing new opportunities or landing a job after a long gap.
cards.career_future_en: You will rebuild stronger than before. Lessons from failure will prevent you from making the same mistakes.
cards.finance_past_en: Was broke or drowning in debt, but started to get a handle on it.
cards.finance_present_en: Financial situation is looking up. Debt is decreasing, or you received help to weather the storm.
cards.finance_future_en: Financial stability will return, and you will be much better at risk management.
cards.action_prompt_en: Pull out the swords and bandage the wounds! Stop moaning; get up and start your new life.
cards.reflection_question_en: What is the first thing you want to do to celebrate your survival?
cards.affirmation_en: I have survived, and I am beginning again beautifully.
cards.hook_en: The worst pain is over... it's only up from here, kitty.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Wake up early, breathe in fresh air deeply. Stretch your limbs and thank your body for enduring the tough times with you.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is the most valuable lesson from this failure?
What good things are you starting to see after the storm?
What promise will you make to yourself for this fresh start?
cards.keywords_light: Recovery, regeneration, rising up, hope returning, survival
cards.keywords_shadow: Relapse, refusing to heal, lingering pain, fear of trying again, victim mentality
cards.image_alt_en: A cat pulling swords out of the ground one by one, bandages falling off, looking weak but determined as the sun rises fully.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A determined black cat pulling ten swords out of the ground, bandages unraveling to reveal healing fur, bright warm sunrise banishing the last grey clouds, atmosphere of relief and resilience, art nouveau style, hopeful colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Ten of Swords Reversed tarot meaning: Recovery, survival, and rising from rock bottom. Learn how to heal and start over.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Missed opportunity, Financial loss, Bad investment, Greed, Delay
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have let a golden opportunity slip through your fingers or made a bad investment due to haste or lack of information. Poor planning in the past might be why you haven't fully established yourself yet.
cards.standalone_present_en: Watch out! Money is leaking from your pocket, or an expected opportunity might fall through. You might be too focused on material things, ignoring other joys, or facing frustrating delays in financial matters.
cards.standalone_future_en: Without caution, you face financial instability, or your dream project might fail due to lack of funding. The wait for success may be longer than anticipated.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past financial mistakes or missed chances are impacting your present. Without better management, the future holds struggles with cash flow or debt.
cards.love_past_en: A relationship started for material gain, or was unstable due to financial issues.
cards.love_present_en: Beware of a relationship too focused on materialism or conflicts over expenses. Love might stumble due to security anxieties.
cards.love_future_en: Lack of financial readiness might hinder starting a family or delay wedding plans.
cards.career_past_en: You took a job that didn't pay enough for the effort, or missed an offer by asking for too much.
cards.career_present_en: Salary stagnates, bonus disappoints, or your project budget gets rejected.
cards.career_future_en: Beware of risky business ventures or unfair employment contracts.
cards.finance_past_en: Spent lavishly leaving no savings, or lost a large sum gambling.
cards.finance_present_en: Finances are tight; income doesn't cover expenses. Don't count on windfalls; beware of investment scams.
cards.finance_future_en: You might have to dip into savings or face a temporary liquidity crunch.
cards.action_prompt_en: Plug the financial leaks now! Audit your accounts and cut unnecessary spending. Don't be greedy, or you'll lose more.
cards.affirmation_en: I learn from mistakes and build wealth with wisdom.
cards.hook_en: Every coin has two sides... don't just look at the profit and forget the risk, kitty.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Clean and polish an old or tarnished coin. Drop it into a piggy bank to clear financial blockages and start accumulating positive energy anew.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What was your worst financial decision, and what did you learn?
What expensive item did you buy but never use?
If you ran out of money tomorrow, what would you do?
cards.keywords_light: Reviewing budget, delayed success, learning frugality, recovering losses, caution
cards.keywords_shadow: Greed, missed chance, poverty mindset, bad investment, financial loss
cards.image_alt_en: A cat looking disappointed as a large gold coin slips from its paws and rolls away into a hole in the ground.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A disappointed calico cat watching a large golden coin slip from its paws and roll into a dark rabbit hole, withered garden background, overcast sky, sense of loss, tarot card style, art nouveau, muted greens and browns --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Ace of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Missed opportunities, financial delays, and greed. Learn how to avoid bad investments and manage money wisely.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Imbalance, Overwhelmed, Financial mess, Disorganization, Dropping the ball
cards.standalone_past_en: You tried to carry the weight of the world or juggle too many tasks, leading to a crash. Past lack of focus resulted in a mess.
cards.standalone_present_en: You've dropped the ball! The plates you were spinning are crashing down. You feel exhausted and confused, unable to manage the chaotic tangle of your finances and work.
cards.standalone_future_en: Unless you reprioritize immediately, you will drown in work or debt. Forcing yourself to do it all will lead to failure. You must be brave enough to cut some things loose.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Overextending yourself in the past has caused present imbalance. Without shedding unnecessary burdens, you face a future of organizational failure.
cards.love_past_en: You tried to balance love with too many other things and failed, or were neglected by a partner who was too busy.
cards.love_present_en: No time for each other. The relationship is strained by financial stress or burnout. Feeling like you're carrying the relationship load alone.
cards.love_future_en: A breakup due to mismanagement is possible, or you might need to pause romance to sort out personal chaos.
cards.career_past_en: You took on too much and missed deadlines, or made mistakes due to haste and lack of focus.
cards.career_present_en: Crisis mode! Workflow collapse. Poor planning has you putting out fires daily instead of actually working.
cards.career_future_en: Beware of severe reprimands or losing credibility because you overpromised and underdelivered.
cards.finance_past_en: Drowning in debt due to overspending, or failing to juggle bills leading to more borrowing.
cards.finance_present_en: In the red! Expenses exceed income. The juggling act is over; it's time to face the financial music.
cards.finance_future_en: You might have to liquidate assets to pay debts or enter debt restructuring.
cards.action_prompt_en: Put it down now! Choose only the single most important thing to do, and say no to the rest.
cards.reflection_question_en: What are you carrying that adds absolutely no value to your life?
cards.affirmation_en: I accept my limits and reorganize my life.
cards.hook_en: Try to catch two fish and you'll lose both... pick one, kitty.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Write down all your tasks. Cross out half of them that aren't urgent today to train your mind in 'sufficiency' and 'letting go'.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Which chaos was caused by your inability to say no?
If you could drop one burden, what would it be?
What is your emergency financial plan?
cards.keywords_light: Simplicity, asking for help, decluttering, focusing, admitting defeat
cards.keywords_shadow: Chaos, debt, mess, overwhelmed, loss of balance
cards.image_alt_en: A clumsy cat tripping over its own feet, dropping two coins that roll away in different directions into a stormy sea.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A clumsy ginger cat tripping on a slippery rock, two golden coins falling from its paws and rolling into dark stormy waves, chaotic scene, sense of loss and disarray, tarot card style, art nouveau, dark teal and grey tones --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Two of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Financial disarray, being overwhelmed, and imbalance. Learn how to regain control and simplify.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Lack of teamwork, Poor quality, Criticism, Disorganization, Ignoring advice
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have experienced project failure due to team disharmony, or made mistakes because of poor initial planning. Past carelessness serves as a memorable lesson.
cards.standalone_present_en: Chaos in the ranks! Work is stalling due to lack of coordination. Or you might be facing criticism for sloppy, 'good enough' work. Fix it fast, or your reputation will suffer.
cards.standalone_future_en: If you don't improve how you collaborate, expected projects might collapse completely, or require a total redo‚Äîwasting both money and time.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past teamwork issues and lack of care are negatively impacting the present. Without listening to advice and improving quality, the future risks failure.
cards.love_past_en: Tried to build a future with the 'wrong' person, or refused to adapt to each other.
cards.love_present_en: Living separate lives; no shared future plans. Or feeling like you're the only one trying.
cards.love_future_en: The relationship might not survive due to a weak foundation or lack of family approval.
cards.career_past_en: Made mistakes that drew criticism, or clashed with colleagues, stalling progress.
cards.career_present_en: Team disintegration! Communication failure, or your stubbornness is damaging the work.
cards.career_future_en: Beware of project collapse due to lack of skill or cooperation. You might be sidelined.
cards.finance_past_en: Lost money hiring substandard workers or poor financial planning.
cards.finance_present_en: Budget blowout due to mismanagement. Don't enter joint ventures right now.
cards.finance_future_en: You might pay to fix shoddy work, or lose money due to lack of expertise.
cards.action_prompt_en: Stop making excuses! Accept the critique and improve your work. Lower your ego and listen.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you acting like a 'full cup', refusing to let anyone else's input in?
cards.affirmation_en: I open my mind to listen and learn from others.
cards.hook_en: Even a cat would turn its nose up at this sloppy work... go fix it.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Clean your desk or a shared workspace to shift the energy and reduce team friction.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What criticism do you hate hearing but know is true?
How have you contributed to the team's problems?
Which skill do you need to upgrade urgently?
cards.keywords_light: Revising plans, Constructive criticism, Learning curve, Fixing mistakes, Reorganizing
cards.keywords_shadow: Sloppiness, Conflict, Disorganization, Laziness, Lack of skill
cards.image_alt_en: A blueprint rolling off a table, tools scattered on the floor, and three cats arguing or ignoring each other in a messy construction site.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A chaotic construction scene inside a cathedral, blueprint torn and rolling off a table, hammer and nails scattered, three cats (Siamese, Persian, Tabby) hissing at each other or looking away, dust and disarray, Tarot Art Nouveau style, muted and dusty colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Three of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Lack of teamwork, poor quality work, and criticism. Learn how to handle feedback and fix the mess.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Letting go, Generosity, Reckless spending, Releasing control, Loss
cards.standalone_past_en: You might have held on too tight until you snapped, forcing you to let go. Or you lost assets through recklessness after a long period of being overly cautious.
cards.standalone_present_en: The cage is open! You are relaxing your grip on security and starting to live a little. Alternatively, you might be spending recklessly to release pent-up stress.
cards.standalone_future_en: A major shift in assets is coming. You may have to sacrifice something material for spiritual freedom, or learn to trust others to help manage your resources.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past clinging is loosening, leading to present change‚Äîwhether positive (generosity) or negative (loss). The future holds a freedom you can choose to shape.
cards.love_past_en: A relationship ended due to suffocating jealousy or possessiveness.
cards.love_present_en: Opening up and lowering walls. Giving your partner space, or finally letting go of someone you've been holding hostage emotionally.
cards.love_future_en: The relationship will feel lighter without control issues, or you'll find a new love that values mutual freedom.
cards.career_past_en: You quit a secure but stifling job, or were removed from a position you clung to.
cards.career_present_en: Delegating tasks to others, or taking risks on new projects instead of always playing it safe.
cards.career_future_en: Job restructuring may force you to relinquish some power, but it will open doors to new opportunities.
cards.finance_past_en: Sudden lack of discipline caused money leaks, or a large payment was needed to fix a problem.
cards.finance_present_en: Wallet alert! You might be retail therapy-ing or overspending to impress friends.
cards.finance_future_en: You'll need to re-budget after a slip-up, or assets might depreciate.
cards.action_prompt_en: Let go of what you can't control! Don't drown clutching your treasures. Share, and you will float.
cards.reflection_question_en: Does letting this go make you feel 'loss' or 'freedom'?
cards.affirmation_en: The more I give, the more I receive in abundance.
cards.hook_en: Squeeze sand too tight and it slips away... try opening your paw, kitty.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Inhale deeply, clench fists tight. Exhale long, open hands instantly. Repeat 3 times to teach your body the feeling of release.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What are you most afraid of losing, and why?
If you donated 3 things today, what would they be?
When was the last time you felt truly relieved?
cards.keywords_light: Generosity, decluttering, releasing stress, charity, opening up
cards.keywords_shadow: Greed, losing money, gambling, carelessness, theft
cards.image_alt_en: A cat accidentally dropping the coins it was holding, looking surprised as they roll away, symbolizing loss of control.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A surprised tabby cat sitting on a chest, four golden coins slipping from its grasp and rolling down a hill, open lock, sense of accidental release or loss, tarot card style, art nouveau, dynamic movement --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Four of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Letting go, reckless spending, and releasing control. Find the balance between saving and giving.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Recovery, End of hardship, Help arriving, Reconnection, Improving health
cards.standalone_past_en: You have just survived the hardest times, like stepping out of a blizzard into warmth. The feelings of isolation and lack are starting to fade.
cards.standalone_present_en: The light is here! You are recovering from financial or health issues. Someone is offering a hand, or you are finally spotting new opportunities to improve your life.
cards.standalone_future_en: Things will keep getting better. Scarcity will be replaced by stability, and hope will return. A new door is opening to welcome you.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past suffering is ending. The present is for healing and recovery, leading to a more stable and warmer future.
cards.love_past_en: A relationship that made you feel worthless has ended, or you have survived a period of loneliness.
cards.love_present_en: Starting to open up to love again, or a troubled relationship is being mended. Warmth is returning.
cards.love_future_en: You will find a supportive and understanding love; you won't have to feel alone anymore.
cards.career_past_en: Survived unemployment or a severe company crisis.
cards.career_present_en: Landed a new job after a long gap, or seeing ways to fix work problems. Stability is returning.
cards.career_future_en: Career will stabilize; past obstacles will be removed.
cards.finance_past_en: Survived being broke or overwhelmed by debt.
cards.finance_present_en: Starting to pay off debts or receiving income support. The financial crisis is passing.
cards.finance_future_en: Financial status will fully recover; you will stand on your own feet again.
cards.action_prompt_en: Open the door to help! Stop wallowing in misery and step out into the light.
cards.reflection_question_en: What has this hardship taught you to value the most?
cards.affirmation_en: I am strong and ready to start a better life.
cards.hook_en: The blizzard has stopped... come out and bask in the warm sun, kitty.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Open all windows to let stale air out. Light floral incense or a candle to welcome fresh energy of new beginnings.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What good things are starting to happen now?
Who reached out to help you in tough times?
What is your new goal after surviving this crisis?
cards.keywords_light: Recovery, improvement, end of bad luck, hope, charity
cards.keywords_shadow: Relapse, lingering debt, spiritual poverty, despair, fear of change
cards.image_alt_en: Two cats finding a warm shelter with food and a fire, looking relieved as the snowstorm clears outside.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: Two relieved cats sitting inside a cozy warm cottage with a fireplace and bowls of food, looking out a window at a clearing snowstorm, sunbeams breaking through clouds, atmosphere of comfort and safety, Tarot Art Nouveau style, warm orange and yellow tones --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Five of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Recovery from hardship, end of isolation, and financial improvement. Find hope and healing.
